title: Inuvik
summary: Inuvik /ɪˈnuːvɪk/ (place of man) is a town in the Northwest Territories of Canada, and is the administrative centre for the Inuvik Region. Inuvik is both a Gwich'in and an Inuvialuit community.[9][10] The community, like Aklavik, is located in both the Gwich'in Settlement Area[11][12] and the Inuvialuit Settlement Region.[13][14][15]
